name: Between the Shadows (Crashim03)
description:
The Game

While looking for a chip to fix your beloved arcade machine, you decide to sneak into an abandoned mall. This place is different from what you expected and you end up getting lost. 

Do you think you can still find what you’re looking for? Do you have the courage to further explore this place? 

It's all up to you.

The Team

Alexandre Duarte/ Programming and Art - https://crashim03.itch.io

Mafalda Carvalhal/ Narrative- https://mafss.itch.io/

Nuno Ribeiro/ Sound Design- https://gunothenuno.itch.io/

We are part of a college game dev group - Game Dev Técnico. You can find us at itch.io, facebook and twitter!
